trends: There has been one other sighting in Carrboro
There were no other sightings in Carrboro on or around December 3rd 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was a outside smoking when i looked up and saw a star\light in the sky that was moving extremely irradically. it seemed maintain a general place in the sky, but was darting in different directions rapidly. it was doing this quite significantly and in ways that no helecopter could ever do. the light seemed to be a large distance away so i couldnt see anything but a light. i called my roomate outside to look, and he saw it's actions and agreed that it was moving significantly and in a way that no normal aircraft would do. the movement was not slight like a flickering or vicrating or something minor. this thing would dart and slide across the sky in a way i have never seen before in a plane or helicopter or plane. hopefully other people saw what i saw at a closer distance or could explain why it was moving the way it was.
Summary: light moving in sky in impossible ways
